DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if whole body vibration exercise improves insulin/glucose dynamics and bone metabolism in Latino Boys.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Whole Body Vibration Exercise on Metabolic Systems in Latino Boys
DOC.criteria: Boy 810 years of age Tanner Stage I Age and gender BMI > 85th percentile Hispanic descent( all four grandparents of Hispanic descent) Acute or chronic illness Any condition known to influence body composition, or insulin/glucose dynamics Musculoskeletal disease, injury, or orthopedic condition that would prevent exercise
